Node.name: <HVACzone-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the HVAC System instances for the vehicle.
Node.Name: Front Left
Front Right
Rear Left
Rear Right
Rear
Stationary

Node.name: HVACFanLevel
Node.Description: Gets and sets the Fan Level for the HVAC zone instance in percent of the maximum level

Node.name: HVACCtlMode
Node.Description: Gets and sets the operating mode for the HVAC instance

Node.name: IntTemp
Node.Description: Gets measured temp for the HVAC Zone Instance, in Deg C (###Celsius??)

Node.name: DesiredIntTemp
Node.Description: Sets desired temp for the HVAC zone instance, in degrees C (###Celsius??)

Node.name: VentTimeOn
Node.Description: Gets and sets the turn on time for the HVAC Stationary vent

Node.name: VentDuration
Node.Description: Gets and sets the turn on time for the HVAC Stationary vent, in seconds

Node.name: VentState
Node.Description: Gets and sets the state for the HVAC Stationary vent, in milliseconds(### ms? use s)

Node.name: RearDefState
Node.Description: Gets and sets the state for the Rear Defroster

Node.name: RearDefInterval
Node.Description: Gets and sets the on time interval for the Rear Defroster in seconds

Node.name: SWHeatState
Node.Description: Gets and sets the state for the steering wheel heater

Node.name: SWHeatTimeOn
Node.Description: Gets and sets the turn on time for the steering wheel heater

Node.name: SWHeatDuration
Node.Description: Gets and sets the on time interval duration for the steering wheel heater, in seconds

Node.name: <flap-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the HVAC Air flaps for the HVAC Zone
Node.Name: Floor
Defroster
Vent
Recirculate/Fresh

Node.name: HVACAirLevel
Node.Description: Gets and Sets the HVAC Air Opening Level for the flap instance

Node.name: SteeringColumn
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the Steering Column

Node.name: ColumnTilt
Node.Description: Sets or gets the vertical tilt position of the steering column in percent of the maximum tilt range
Node.Name: Range
Full Down Tilt
Full Up Tilt

Node.name: ColumnTelescope
Node.Description: Sets or gets the telescoping position of the steering column in percent of the maximum extension range

Node.name: LockState
Node.Description: Sets or gets the steering column lock state

Node.name: PedalPosition
Node.Description: Sets or gets the Pedal assembly position in percent of the maximum extension range

Node.name: Seats
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the seats of the vehicle

Node.name: <seat-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents a specific seat or seating position instance of the vehicle
Node.Name: Left Front seat, or left front portion of front bench seat
Right Front seat or Right Front portion of front bench seat
Middle front seat or middle portion of front bench seat
Entire front bench seat unit
Left second row seat, or left rear portion of second row bench seat
Middle second row seat, or middle rear portion of second row bench seat
Right second row seat, or right rear portion of second row bench seat
Entire second row bench seat
Left third row seat, or left rear portion of third row bench seat
Middle third row seat, or middle rear portion of third row bench seat
Right third row seat, or right rear portion of third row bench seat
Entire third row bench seat
Left fourth row seat, or left rear portion of fourth row bench seat
Middle fourth row seat, or middle rear portion of fourth row bench seat
Right fourth row seat, or right rear portion of fourth row bench seat
Entire fourth row bench seat
Left fifth row seat, or left rear portion of fifth row bench seat
Middle fifth row seat, or middle rear portion of fifth row bench seat
Right fifth row seat, or right rear portion of fifth row bench seat
Entire fifth row bench seat

Node.name: Occupied
Node.Description: Gets the occupancy state of the seat Position

Node.name: Mass
Node.Description: Gets the Mass measure for the occupant of the seat Position

Node.name: SeatBelt
Node.Description: Gets the seatbelt state for the seat position

Node.name: <axis-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the control axes of the seats of the vehicle. The node name is one of:
Node.Name: Seat Bottom
Seat Bottom Front
Seat Bottom Rear
Seat Back
Headrest
Knee Support
Seat Bottom Bolster Left
Seat Back Bolster Left
Seat Bottom Bolster Right
Seat Back Bolster Right
Seat Lumbar Support

Node.name: VerticalPosition
Node.Description: Gets and/or Sets the Seat Axis vertical position in percent of range of motion

Node.name: LongPosition
Node.Description: Gets and/or Sets the Seat Axis longitudinal position in percent of range of motion

Node.name: LatPosition
Node.Description: Gest and/or Sets the Seat Axis lateral position in percent of range of motion

Node.name: TiltPosition
Node.Description: Gest and/or Sets the Seat Axis tilt position in percent of range of motion

Node.name: <heater-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the heaters for the seats of the vehicle. The name must be one of:
Node.Name: Seat Bottom Front
Seat Bottom Rear
Seat Back Upper
Seat Back Lower

Node.name: HeatState
Node.Description: Sets or gets the state of the seat heater

Node.name: HeatTime
Node.Description: Sets and Gets the time the Seat Heater is set to turn on

Node.name: HeatInterval
Node.Description: Sets and gest the seat heater On interval duration in seconds

Node.name: <cooler-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the coolers for the seats of the vehicle.
Node.Name: Seat Bottom Front
Seat Bottom Rear
Seat Back Upper
Seat Back Lower

Node.name: CoolState
Node.Description: Sets or gets the state of the seat cooler

Node.name: CoolTime
Node.Description: Sets and Gets the time the Seat cooler is set to turn on

Node.name: CoolInterval
Node.Description: Sets and gets the seat cooler On interval duration in seconds

Node.name: InteriorLights
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the interior lights of the vehicle

Node.name: <interior-light-type>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents an instance of the interior lights. The node name is one of:
Node.Name: Front cabin overhead lamp
Rear cabin overhead lamp
Left front map light
Right front map light
Left rear passengerï¿½s map light
Right rear passengerï¿½s map light
Rear Cargo Bay Lamp
Liftgate Lamp
Left Front Entry Lamp
Right Front Entry Lamp
Left Rear Entry Lamp
Right Rear Entry Lamp
Trunk Lamp
Glove Box Lamp

Node.name: LampLevel
Node.Description: Gets and/or Sets the Illumination level of the of the interior light instance

Node.name: Fade
Node.Description: Sets or gets the fade time interval in seconds

Node.name: Delay
Node.Description: Sets and or gets the time interval for the light on/off or off/on delay in seconds
